collectible.title: Golden Ring
collectible.subtitle: Mother Eve's Blessing
collectible.text: After two people 'get intimate' in accordance with Mother Eve's rules, a symbol of Mother Eve's blessing manifests on their finger in the form of a golden ring - but make sure to not break any of those rules, lest you be marked forever as an outlaw.

collectible.title: The Black Evenicle
collectible.subtitle: The secrets of Mother Eve's life
collectible.text: The Evenicle, the story of Mother Eve and Adan, the first man... uncensored. Written by the dragon QD, the Black Evenicle contains every raunchy detail about the lives of humanity's divine ancestors.
collectible.unlock: Face all of humanity's sins side-by-side with Asterisk.
